channel.title: I realy realy realy need help
channel.description:
i realy need some help to clean out my pc. i got a sub7trojan and like 100000000 vira in a folder i cant access called C:\system volume information\ nod32 amd avg keeps deleting, cant quranty or heal.
please help me clean my pc so none of my mums importan files will get lost, not to emention all my files.
edit: this just poped up File C:\System Volume Information\_restore{4383BBD8-510F-4E9D-9687-9CA1D92D7E49}\RP78\A0021559.exe is infected with trojan Win32/Spy.PerfKey.R. The file can be deleted. It is strongly recommended that you back up any crucial data before you proceed.

item.title: I realy realy realy need help
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

[quote=“nicodk, post:10, topic:69120”]lol dont care. ill keep my harddisk, and copy the files i need

argh can any1 plz help me remove sub7 keylogger and some files that cant be deleted? got rid of most vira with nod but still some can only be quaratied not deleted…
i have four or these that cant be deleted
C:\System Volume Information_restore{4383BBD8-510F-4E9D-9687-9CA1D92D7E49}\RP77\A0020885.exe »RAR »bpk.exe - Win32/Spy.PerfKey trojan[/quote]
www.trendmicro.com/hc_intro/default.asp
Run a scan.

Read full topic
